title: 5.1 Master Challenge 1
question: Create an app to get the title, first name, middle name and last name of the user as four different inputs. Join the inputs and display the full name of the user.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

 -2
 3
 5
